about_the_game:
Incident Survival is a Role-playing (board) game. It is multiplayer game for 6 to 20 players.

At least one player is appointed as the game master (the host). You will have a fictional incident available - a situation that will place you and your characters in an unusual and challenging situation from which they need to find a way out, or just survive as long as possible. The main help is a shelter, a temporary place with limited amenities and living spaces.

Incident is a short description of the event. Here you can encounter anything, starting with possible natural disasters and ending with the invasion of fantasy creatures in your world.

Shelter is your closest way to escape from problems. It can be an ordinary basement filled with canned food, or even a fortified military base deep underground. Don't forget to keep an eye on life support systems and any problems or threats that arise as the game progresses.

Character is an avatar that is represented by each player. He has a number of attributes, such as profession, hobby, age, personalities, body and health status. To make the game dynamic, each character has a number of active and passive skills, as well as inventory and some special information.

Your fate is in your own hands. Join together with others who want to test their abilities in a challenging situation and use the right arguments to convince others of your worth.
